description:
The origin of Duel Monsters is revealed!  Using the magic of the Millennium Necklace, Egyptian historian Ishizu Ishtar shows Kaiba how Duel Monsters was played millenniums ago!  The ancient games have resurrected in modern times, along with three almighty beasts of unstoppable devastation – the Egyptian God Monsters!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 失われた王[ファラオ]の記憶
